doc.title: Animals in the Bible
doc.plot: Our planet is teeming with life. The animal kingdom dazzles our senses with it's intricate complexity and majestic beauty. From the tiniest ant to the soaring eagle to the mighty lion, every creature displays the wisdom and power of the Creator. Embark on a journey of discovery from the Creation to the present day. Everywhere you look, whether it be at the camel as the 'ship of the desert' or an undersea dive to witness the colorful schools of fish, you will be moved to praise God the Creator for His masterful design. Both educational and entertaining, Animals in the Bible delivers you a renewed sense of awe for the Creator, and the creatures that inhabit the Earth.
